Powerful Features

Fading Ink

Draw with ink that automatically disappears, perfect for temporary highlights or instructions.

Global Hotkeys

Access tools quickly with keyboard shortcuts, even when Riter is not in focus.

Direct Screen Drawing

Draw directly on top of any application window, making it ideal for live demonstrations.

Multiple Shapes

Easily draw lines, arrows, rectangles, circles, and more using keyboard shortcuts.

Get Started

Installation & Usage

  1. Download the latest release from the GitHub Releases page.
  2. Extract the downloaded file.
  3. Run the executable file (requires Windows and .NET 8 runtime).
  4. Use global hotkeys like D (Draw), E (Erase), Ctrl+F (Fading Ink), and Ctrl+T (Clear) to start drawing!

For more details, visit the full README on GitHub.
